price: y solo el rostro de tu Señor perdurará por siempre, el Majestuoso y el Noble.
arabic: وَيَبۡقَىٰ وَجۡهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wayabqā wajhu rabbika dhū al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
